active.description: Filter only on `0` = non-active or `1` = active entities in the response

department_id.description: A department ID to filter the response on

email.description: An email address to filter the response (exact match, non-case sensitive)

people_type_id.description: The people type to filter the response on `1` = Employee, `2` = Contractor, `3` = Placeholder

employee_type_id.description: The employee type to filter the response on `1` = Full time, `0` = Part time

tag_name.description: Case-insensitive, URL encoded, exact text match of tag names to filter the response on. Comma-delimited values will return all matching records.

page.description: The page number of the page of results to return, default `1`

per-page.description: The number of items per page, default is `50`

sort.description: A field to sort the list values in the response, ascending (default), pre-fix `-` to apply descending. (Limited fields, varies per endpoint)

modified_since.description: Datetime in either `YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss` or as a Unix timestamp in seconds to filter on all records with an equal or later `modified` timestamp

fields.description: Comma-delimited set of fields to include in the response

expand.description: Comma-delimited values expands the response with additional fields: `account`,  `managers`, and `contracts`
